009package imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013public enum CalibrationImage implements ImageResource {
014        CalibImageStack("CalibImageStack.tif"),
015        CalibIm1,
016        CalibIm2,
017        CalibIm3,
018        CalibIm4,
019        CalibIm5,
020        marked1,
021        marked2,
022        marked3,
023        marked4,
024        marked5;
025
026        // private final static String BASEDIR = "DATA";
027        private final String filename;
028
029        CalibrationImage() {
030                this(null);
031        }
032
033        CalibrationImage(String filename) {
034                this.filename = filename;
035        }
036
037        @Override
038        public String getFileName() {
039                return (this.filename != null) ? this.filename : this.autoName();
040        }
041        
042        // @Override
043        // public String getRelativeDirectory() {
044        //      return BASEDIR;
045        // }
046
047
048        String getAbsolutePath() {
049                return this.getClass().getResource("") + "/" + getRelativeDirectory() + "/" + getFileName();
050        }
051
052}
